00011 // Standard includes
00012 #include <ServiceControl/UserFriendlyAPI.h>

00014 // Add local class RegisterThread
00015 #include "BrowsingTest.h"
00016 #include "RegisterThread.h"

00018 using namespace std;

00020 using namespace Omiscid;

00023 /* @brief Usage function */
00024 void BrowsingUsage(char * ProgramName)
00025 {
00026     OmiscidError( "%s is used to demonstrate User Friendly browsing methods using OMiSCID.\n", ProgramName );
00027     OmiscidError( "Usage: %s \n", ProgramName );
00028 }
00029
00030 namespace Omiscid
00031 {
00032 class BrowseListener : public ServiceRepositoryListener
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     void ServiceAdded( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService );
00036     void ServiceRemoved( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService );
00037 };
00038
00039 }
00040
00041 void BrowseListener::ServiceAdded( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService )
00042 {
00043     cout << ProxyForService.GetName() << " (" << ProxyForService.GetPeerIdAsString() << ") appear.\n";
00044 }
00045
00046 void BrowseListener::ServiceRemoved( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService )
00047 {
00048     cout << ProxyForService.GetName() << " (" << ProxyForService.GetPeerIdAsString() << ") disappear.\n";
00049 }

00051
00052 /* @brief main program entry. No need to give parameter */
00053 #ifdef OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00054 // Call test in a separate function
00055 int Omiscid::DoBrowsingTest(int argc, char*argv[] )
00056 #else
00057 /* @brief main program entry. No need to give parameter */
00058 int main(int argc, char*argv[] )
00059 #endif // OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00060 {
00061     unsigned int i;
00062     int j;
00063
00064     // Constant values
00065     // The number of service to register
00066     const unsigned int NumberOfServicesToRegister = 10;
00067
00068     // A variable to store pointers on RegisterThread
00069     RegisterThread * pRegThread;
00070
00071     // parsing parameters, 0 is the program name
00072     for( j = 1 ; j < argc; j++ )
00073     {
00074         if ( argv[j][0] != '-' )
00075         {
00076             OmiscidError( "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00077             BrowsingUsage(argv[0]);
00078             return -1;
00079         }
00080
00081         // Do the user ask for help
00082         if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-h" ) == 0 ||
00083              strcmp( argv[j], "-help" ) == 0 ||
00084              strcmp( argv[j], "--help" ) == 0 )
00085         {
00086             BrowsingUsage(argv[0]);
00087         }
00088
00089         OmiscidError( "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00090         BrowsingUsage(argv[0]);
00091         return -1;
00092     }
00093
00094     // A simple list to store RegisterThread objects
00095     SimpleList<RegisterThread*> ListOfRegisterThreads;
00096
00097     // Variables to Compute Statics
00098     unsigned int EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = 0;
00099
00100     // Print Welcome message
00101     OmiscidMessage( "This program is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n" );
00102     OmiscidMessage( "As it is ditributed, registering unique service and searching for services\n" );
00103     OmiscidMessage( "is a huge processing. See Accumulator/ClientAccumator examples for communication schema.\n\n" );
00104
00105 // Register services
00106     OmiscidMessage( "Start to register services.\n" );
00107
00108     // Create an object to now when the total time
00109     // To register the services
00110     ElapsedTime TimeCounter;
00111
00112     for( i = 1; i <= NumberOfServicesToRegister; i++ )
00113     {
00114         // Create a new register service called
00115         pRegThread = new OMISCID_TLM RegisterThread(i);
00116
00117         // if ok
00118         if ( pRegThread != (RegisterThread*)NULL )
00119         {
00120             // Start the Thread
00121             pRegThread->Start();
00122
00123             // add it to my list of threads
00124             ListOfRegisterThreads.Add( pRegThread );
00125         }
00126     }
00127
00128     // Get number of waited services
00129     EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements();
00130
00131     // Wait until all registered services are present
00132     OmiscidMessage( "Wait for service to be ready.\n" );
00133     for(;;)
00134     {
00135         // Wait for all create thread to register their service
00136         if ( (unsigned int)RegisterThread::NbRegistered == EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices )
00137         {
00138             break;
00139         }
00140
00141         // If not done, wait 10 ms maximum for a new service registration
00142         RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered.Wait(10);
00143     }
00144
00145     OmiscidMessage( "=> %d service(s) are registered in %u ms.\n", EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices, TimeCounter.Get() );
00146
00147 // Create a repository for Omiscid services !
00148
00149     // First create a listener Object
00150     BrowseListener BrowsingForServices;
00151
00152     // Now create the repository
00153     ServiceRepository * BrowseObject = ServiceFactory.CreateServiceRepository();
00154
00155     if ( BrowseObject == (ServiceRepository *)NULL )
00156     {
00157             cerr << "Cound not create ServiceRepository. Exit." << endl;
00158             goto FreeAndExit;
00159     }
00160
00161     fprintf( stderr, "Add BrowseCallback object to the repository and wait for 5 seconds.\n" );
00162     fprintf( stderr, "All available services must appear.\n" );
00163     // Add it as listener of the ServiceRepository object
00164     // We want to be notified for all services (already registered and news ones)
00165     if ( BrowseObject->AddListener( &BrowsingForServices ) == false )
00166     {
00167             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00168             goto FreeAndExit;
00169     }
00170
00171     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00172
00173     fprintf( stderr, "Remove BrowseCallback object to the repository (no notification).\n" );
00174     fprintf( stderr, "Nothing must be listed in the 5 next seconds.\n" );
00175     if ( BrowseObject->RemoveListener( &BrowsingForServices ) == false )
00176     {
00177             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00178             goto FreeAndExit;
00179     }
00180
00181     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00182
00183     // Add it as listener of the ServiceRepository object
00184     // We want to be notified only for new services
00185     fprintf( stderr, "Add BrowseCallback object to the repository (ask notification only for new events).\n" );
00186     fprintf( stderr, "Nothing must appear as all services are already here. Wait 5 seconds.\n" );
00187     if ( BrowseObject->AddListener( &BrowsingForServices, true ) == false )
00188     {
00189             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00190             goto FreeAndExit;
00191     }
00192
00193     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00194     fprintf( stderr, "Nothing appears (hopefully) ?\n" );
00195     fprintf( stderr, "Add a new service. As it is a new event, this one should appear. Wait for 5 seconds\n" );
00196
00197     // Create a new register service called
00198     pRegThread = new OMISCID_TLM RegisterThread(i);
00199
00200     // if ok
00201     if ( pRegThread != (RegisterThread*)NULL )
00202     {
00203         // Start the thead
00204         pRegThread->Start();
00205
00206         // add it to my list of threads
00207         ListOfRegisterThreads.Add( pRegThread );
00208     }
00209
00210     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00211
00212     fprintf( stderr, "Remove BrowseCallback object to the repository (request to be notified as if services disappears).\n" );
00213     fprintf( stderr, "All services should be marked as disappear). Wait for 5 seconds.\n" );
00214     if ( BrowseObject->RemoveListener( &BrowsingForServices, true ) == false )
00215     {
00216             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00217             goto FreeAndExit;
00218     }
00219
00220     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00221
00222 FreeAndExit:
00223
00224     // printf use for autotest
00225     printf( "Test ok.\n" );
00226
00227     fprintf( stderr, "Cleanup everything.\n" );
00228
00229     // Free ServiceRepository object
00230     if ( BrowseObject != (ServiceRepository *)NULL )
00231     {
00232         delete BrowseObject;
00233     }
00234
00235     // printf use for autotest
00236     printf( "Test ok.\n" );
00237     fflush( stdout );
00238
00239 // Unregister service and close all connections
00240     fprintf( stderr, "Unregister service and close all connections.\n" );
00241     // Reset time counter
00242     TimeCounter.Reset();
00243     // Delete registered thread
00244     while( ListOfRegisterThreads.IsNotEmpty() )
00245     {
00246         delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00247     }
00248     fprintf( stderr, "=> done in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00249
00250     // exit
00251     return 0;
00252 }
